column2: ENGLISH
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has become Trusting. This may not be the most beneficial for [FromFrom.GetHerHim] in the long run.
It seems that [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has become Slothful.
Sadly, [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has become Greedy. I guess I have to keep checking my purse everyday now.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has started to stutter. This may turn out slightly embarrassing for [FromFrom.GetHerHim] in the future.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] is exhibiting a severe anger constantly. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Wroth trait.
I do not seem to be able to trust [FromFrom.GetFirstName] anymore. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Deceitful trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to work so hard when [FromFrom.GetSheHe] needs something done. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Diligent trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems almost afraid of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] shadow. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Craven trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to not believe anything anyone says. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Cynical trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to enjoy watching others in pain. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Cruel trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems so modest and polite. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Humble trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] is definitely sure of [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself]. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Proud trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] speaks the truth whenever possible, and never seems to lie. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Honest trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to be quiet and not asserting [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself]. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Shy trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to be taking [FromFrom.GetHerHis] time when taking decisions. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Patient trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to be getting along with everyone. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Gregarious trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] doesn't really understand the concept of rules and laws. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Arbitrary trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to take a great interest in fair rules and true justice. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Just trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to treat everyone nicely. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Kind trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has become a true believer and want to follow the faith. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Zealous trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to have no fears at all. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Brave trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] always seems to covet what others have. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Envious trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to constantly spend time with the opposite sex. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Lustful trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] always gives freely to everyone that has a need or want. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Charitable trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] does not seem to like physical contact with other people. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Chaste trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] does not seem to trust ANYONE! [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Paranoid trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to always be moderate, and never does anything to excess. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Temperate trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to never be satisfied, and just gorges [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself] on food and drink. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Gluttonous trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] sets great goals for [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself], and works hard at reaching them. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Ambitious trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems satisfied with what [FromFrom.GetSheHe] has. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Content trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has been severely injured. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Wounded trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has been crippled for life. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Maimed trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] worries too much over things [FromFrom.GetSheHe] cannot influence. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Stressed trait.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has been cured from [FromFrom.GetHerHis] illness! [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has lost the Ill trait.
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has lost the joy of life. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Depressed trait.
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is feverish and has a headache. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Ill trait.
It is clear that all other people are friendly and want my best. I've gained the §YTrusting§! trait.
Everything seems so hard to do, not really worth the effort. I've gained the §YSlothful§! trait.
I want it all, and I want it now! I've gained the §YGreedy§! trait.
I can't speak properly, I've gained the §YStutter§! trait.
Everything frustrates me! I've gained the §YWroth§! trait.
People are such gullible fools! I've gained the §YDeceitful§! trait.
Hard work is always needed to achieve something in life. I've gained the §YDiligent§! trait.
The world is such a scary place. I've gained the §YCraven§! trait.
The world is such a big lie. I've gained the §YCynical§! trait.
I like seeing other people cry. I've gained the §YCruel§! trait.
Everyone deserves respect, and I will give it to them. I've gained the §YHumble§! trait.
I know that I am great and deserve respect. I've gained the §YProud§! trait.
Telling lies just seems so wrong. I have gained the §YHonest§! trait.
I'm always awkward talking to the people.. I have gained the §YShy§! trait.
Rushing into action seems foolish. I have gained the §YPatient§! trait.
Talking to people, and getting to know them is something I really like. I have gained the §YGregarious§! trait.
Do I have to abide by laws and rules? My whim sounds more interesting. I have gained the §YArbitrary§! trait.
Treating people fairly and providing justice is my duty. I have gained the §YJust§! trait.
Treating people nicely feels good. I have gained the §YKind§! trait.
Following [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]'s will is more important than anything else. I have gained the Zealous trait.
There is nothing to fear, but fear itself. I've gained the §YBrave§! trait.
Others have things that I should have been given. I've gained the §YEnvious§! trait.
Life spent in the arms of another, is a life spent well. I've gained the §YLustful§! trait.
I have lots of things, and giving my surplus to others is a good deed. I've gained the §YCharitable§! trait.
I don't feel comfortable touching other human beings. I've gained the §YChaste§! trait.
They are out to get me! I've gained the §YParanoid§! trait.
Moderation is the key! I've gained the §YTemperate§! trait.
There is nothing better than just eating and drinking! I've gained the §YGluttonous§! trait.
I deserve good things, and I will work to get them! I've gained the §YAmbitious§! trait.
I am perfectly happy with the way things are. I've gained the §YContent§! trait.
I have been injured badly. I've gained the §YWounded§! trait.
I have been crippled for life. I've gained the §YMaimed§! trait.
There are too many things to do, too many things that worries me. I have gained the §YStressed§! trait.
I have been cured from my illness! I have lost the §YIll§! trait.
My body is sapless and feeble. I have gained the §YInfirm§! trait.
The temptations and desires of the body no longer holds me down. I have gained the Celibate trait.
I drink to forget and remember my trouble no more. I have gained the Drunkard trait.
I have lost the joy of life. I have gained the §YDepressed§! trait.
My lovely garden does not bring me as much joy as it used to do. I have lost the Gardener trait.
I don't feel so good. I have gained the §YIll§! trait.
I am no longer able to torture another human being, no matter the reason. I have lost the §YImpaler§! trait.
I used to love the clang of a sword's blade against another and the satisfaction I felt after defeating my opponent. Not anymore. I have lost the Duelist trait
The animals in the forest will from now on be safe from my bloodlust. I have lost the Hunter trait.
I cannot get the words to flow as they used to and the idea to write my thoughts in poetry has ceased to be a necessity. I have lost the Poet trait.
I no longer find it hard or awkward to talk to people. I have lost the §YShy§! trait.
I no longer fear the world, I embrace it and feel safe. I have lost the §YCraven§! trait.
People no longer interests me as much as they used to do and I never voluntarily start a conversation with anyone anymore. I have lost the §YGregarious§! trait
It can be fun digging into work and see how your effort makes a difference. I have lost the §YSlothful§! trait.
I am not happy with the way things are. I have lost the §YContent§! trait.
There are people in the world that deserves my respect. I have lost the §YProud§! trait.
My skin is glowing, my hair is always perfect and the opposite sex yearn for me to take notice of them. I have gained the §YFair§! trait.
It must be a miracle, I no longer have problem pronouncing S or any other letter! I have lost the §YLisp§! trait.
I have gone so long without craving the touch of another human, but now I have grown wiser. I have lost the §YChaste§! trait.
The voices are whispering to me, telling me what to do... horrible, horrible things they want me to do... I have gained the §YLunatic§! trait.
I have grown more trusting, accepting whatever fate has in store for me. I have lost the Paranoid trait.
I have become aware of people's duplicity. I have lost the Trusting trait.
I have suffered enough pain and betrayal. Why help those who hurt me back? I have lost the Kind trait.
The wounds have marked me for life. I have gained the Scarred trait.
The fog in my mind has lifted. I realize now that I used to be a Lunatic!
I have lost my absolute convictions and try to keep an open mind. I have lost the Zealous trait.
My frank bluntness won't get me into trouble anymore - I have lost the Honest trait.
I have learned to take pride in my actions and in my great family. I have lost the Humble trait.
The pressures of life no longer seem so overwhelming. I am not §YStressed§! anymore!
I woke up this morning with a big smile on my face. I am no longer Depressed!
I am speaking in tongues and screaming obscenities at random times, people believe me to be possessed.
I've come to realize that world is a full of mystery and wonder. I am no longer Cynical.
The concepts of fairness and rules have lost their luster to me. I have lost the Just trait.
Why would all these delicious foods and drinks exist if we were not meant to taste them? I've lost the Temperate trait.
Not everything in life needs hard work to achieve. I've lost the Diligent trait.
Caution is often the wisest choice. I've lost the Brave trait.
Giving to others what I may need in the future is not always the best choice. I've lost the §YCharitable§! trait.
Sometimes sharing what I have with others feels good. I've lost the §YGreedy§! trait.
My actions have killed a member of my family. I have gained the Tribal Kinslayer trait.
My actions have killed a close relative of mine! I have gained the Kinslayer trait.
My actions have killed a member of my extended family! I have gained the Familial Kinslayer trait.
My actions have killed a member of my dynasty! I have gained the Dynastic Kinslayer trait.
